resources.string: Please Unplug your Phone from Charger
In android 10+ in order to show alert when Screen is off you need to give the \"Appear on Top\" permission.
In order to let app not being killed in background please turn off Battery Optimization for this app in settings.
Maximum Charge threshold to trigger the alert:
Minimum Charge threshold to trigger the alert:
Can not set Charging limit lower than discharging limit!
You will be alerted after 5 minutes if your phone is still on Charger.
You will be alerted after 5 minutes if your phone is still on Battery.
Here You can see the information about you phone\'s battery.
With this slider you can adjust the charge threshold to trigger alert.\nFor example if you set the slider on 90% when your phone charge reaches to 90% you will be notified.
With this slider you can adjust the discharge threshold to trigger alert.\nFor example if you set the slider on 20% when your phone battery percentage drops to 20% you will be notified.
The amount of alert\'s audio volume.\nDefault is 0 which means you just seed the alert screen but you can increase it in case of you want audio alert too.
By default the app respect your DND settings and do not play any audio alert when DND mode is on but you can by pass DND mode and have audio alert by turning on this switch.
If you want the background service automatically runs on phone\'s startup, turn on this switch.
The service is not running until you turn it on.\nWhen you tap this button the background service will be enabled and the color of button turns red.
